title: NLP Controlled Wheelchair
summary: A larger number of people have found themselves unable to walk. In order to help these people keep their independence, I am hoping to soon develop a motorised wheelchair that can be controlled with speech.

title: Music Player App
summary: To help me progress in my career, I am hoping to learn app development. As a goal in my learning, I am hoping to develop a music playing app that will contain all the common features of already existing music apps, such as playlists, shuffle, sleep timers and bluetooth control.
